original_title: いぬかみっ! THE MOVIE 特命霊的捜査官・仮名史郎っ!
overview: In 2007, the Punishment of Sexual Perversions Law came into effect. The city is surrounded by a squadron wearing protective suits and they begin to arrest any who look like perversions. No wonder that Inukami Master Keita and Inukami Yoko are wanted for Class A perversions. What will happen to Keita, Yoko, Kaoru's Inukami, and the other lovely perversions? What about Karina? Source: AnimeNfo
title: Inukami! The Movie: Tokumei Reiteki Sousakan Karina Shirou!
